Package nl.weeaboo.vn.render

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAsyncRenderTask
    Queued rendering task.
    IDrawBuffer
    Batches draw calls for efficient rendering.
    IDrawTransform
    Common properties for a draw call.
    IOffscreenRenderTask
    Async render-to-texture.
    IOffscreenRenderTaskBuffer
    Queues IOffscreenRenderTask to be completed later.
    IRenderEnv
    Exposes properties of the main render target (screen size, etc.)
    IRenderEnvConsumer
    Shared interface for classes that require a IRenderEnv.
    IRenderLogic
    Custom rendering logic.
    IScreenRenderer
    Renders to the screen.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RenderUtil
    Various useful functions related to rendering.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DisplayMode
    Display mode of the application.
